projects.name: My Yesterday is not My Today
projects.description: Every day is a new day. For some, each day is nothing like its yesterday. So how do people maintain a sleep routine?
projects.alt: Sleep scores from the Sleep as Android app

projects.name: New Tech, New Interactions
projects.description: Ooh la la, AR glasses! It shines and sparkles, but how does that affect our interactions with each other?
projects.alt: Line drawing of one person with AR glasses another person without
